news.title: Spark’s new lending suite tests Wall Street’s appetite for onchain stablecoins
news.titleOriginal: Spark’s new lending suite tests Wall Street’s appetite for onchain stablecoins
news.summary: Spark is rolling out Spark Prime and Spark Institutional Lending, aiming to turn its DeFi stablecoin stack into institutional margin and credit lines.

news.title: Bitcoin price drops 3% as analyst warns bulls lack 'momentum' to flip $69K
news.titleOriginal: Bitcoin price drops 3% as analyst warns bulls lack 'momentum' to flip $69K
news.summary: Bitcoin analysis warned the $69,000 mark may end up as long-term resistance again, thanks to its significance in BTC price history.

news.title: Crypto super PAC to spend $5M on Barry Moore’s Senate bid: Report
news.titleOriginal: Crypto super PAC to spend $5M on Barry Moore’s Senate bid: Report
news.summary: Crypto political action committee Fairshake spent roughly $130 million during the 2024 US elections to support pro-crypto candidates.

news.title: White House crypto bill talks ‘productive,’ but no deal yet
news.titleOriginal: White House crypto bill talks ‘productive,’ but no deal yet
news.summary: The second meeting between crypto and the banks at the White House over the crypto market structure bill has yet to come to an agreement on stablecoin

news.title: Crypto’s ‘age of speculation’ may be ending: Galaxy’s Novogratz
news.titleOriginal: Crypto’s ‘age of speculation’ may be ending: Galaxy’s Novogratz
news.summary: Galaxy CEO Mike Novogratz says crypto's high-risk, high-reward reputation could be replaced by lower, steadier returns brought by real-world asset tok
